TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventSourceCreationData extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用于在本地或远程计算机上创建事件日志源的配置设置。

span.span: Represents the configuration settings used to create an event log source on the local computer or a remote computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类，以配置新的源向事件日志写入本地化的项。Use the class to configure a new source for writing localized entries to an event log. 不需要此类用于从事件日志中读取。It is not necessary to use this class to read from an event log. 此类定义新的事件源和其关联的事件日志的配置设置。This class defines the configuration settings for a new event source and its associated event log. 关联的事件日志可以是本地计算机或远程计算机上。The associated event log can be on the local computer or a remote computer. 若要在本地计算机上创建新的源为新的或现有的事件日志，请设置并的属性，并调用方法。To create a new source for a new or existing event log on the local computer, set the and properties of an and call the method. 此方法创建事件源中指定它为事件日志中指定的属性和寄存器。This method creates the event source you specify in the property and registers it for the event log specified in . 此行为是类似于使用类来注册事件日志的事件源。This behavior is similar to using the class to register an event source for an event log. 使用和方法将事件写入到事件日志。Use the and methods to write events to an event log. 必须指定事件源写入事件;必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和它们的配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configurations. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 可以创建现有事件日志或新的事件日志的事件源。You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log. 创建新的源为新的事件日志时，系统注册该日志的源，但直到第一个条目写入不创建该日志。When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 每个源只能写入到一个事件日志一次;但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。Each source can only write to one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，你的应用程序可能需要多个源配置为使用不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件。For example, your application might need multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 若要更改现有源的配置详细信息，必须删除源，然后使用新的配置创建它。To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration. 如果其他应用程序或组件使用现有的源，请使用更新的配置，而无需删除现有源创建新的源。If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration rather than deleting the existing source. 为事件类别和消息字符串，可以使用本地化的资源注册事件源。You can register the event source with localized resources for your event category and message strings. 你的应用程序可以写入事件日志项使用资源标识符，而不指定实际的字符串。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers, rather than specifying the actual string. 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来查找并显示基于当前语言设置的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 可以注册一个单独的文件的事件类别、 消息和参数插入字符串，也可以注册相同的资源文件，所有三种类型的字符串。You can register a separate file for event categories, messages, and parameter insertion strings, or you can register the same resource file for all three types of strings. 使用， ， ，和属性来配置要本地化的项写入事件日志的源。Use the , , , and properties to configure the source to write localized entries to the event log. 如果你的应用程序直接将字符串值写入事件日志，您不需要设置这些属性。If your application writes string values directly to the event log, you do not need to set these properties. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 方法直接写入事件日志写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。The method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file. 使用方法来写入事件时使用的本地化的消息资源文件。Use the method to write events using a localized message resource file. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不带资源文件的不同源和使用中的源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过命令行参数设置的事件源的配置属性。The following code example sets the configuration properties for an event source from command-line arguments. 输入的参数指定事件源名称、 事件日志名称、 计算机名和事件消息资源文件。The input arguments specify the event source name, event log name, computer name, and event message resource file. 代码示例验证的源不与现有事件源、 冲突，然后创建指定的事件日志的新事件源。The code example verifies that the source does not conflict with an existing event source, and then creates the new event source for the specified event log. [!code-cpp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/VB/source.vb#1)]

permission.span: 用于调用的任何成员以完全信任。

span.span: for calling any member of with full trust.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string source, string logName) cil managed
Public Sub New (source As String, logName As String)

param.name: source
param.span: 要在事件日志中注册为项源的名称。

span.span: The name to register with the event log as a source of entries.

param.name: logName
param.span: 要将来自源的项写入其中的日志的名称。

span.span: The name of the log to which entries from the source are written.

summary.span: 使用指定的事件源和事件日志名称对 类的新实例进行初始化。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified event source and event log name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要向事件日志写入条目，必须首先创建事件日志的事件源。To write entries to an event log, you must first create an event source for the event log. 若要注册新的源，初始化实例时，配置应用程序，并调用的实例属性方法。To register a new source, initialize an instance, configure the instance properties for your application, and call the method. 注册了源后，可以从源使用编写条目或方法。After the source is registered, you can write entries from the source using the or methods. 为事件类别和消息字符串，可以使用本地化的资源注册事件源。You can register the event source with localized resources for your event category and message strings. 你的应用程序可以写入事件日志项使用资源标识符，而不指定实际的字符串。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers, rather than specifying the actual string. 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来查找并显示基于当前语言设置的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 可以注册一个单独的文件的事件类别、 消息和参数插入字符串，也可以注册相同的资源文件，所有三种类型的字符串。You can register a separate file for event categories, messages, and parameter insertion strings, or you can register the same resource file for all three types of strings. 使用， ， ，和属性来配置要本地化的项写入事件日志的源。Use the , , , and properties to configure the source to write localized entries to the event log. 如果你的应用程序直接将字符串值写入事件日志，您不需要设置这些属性。If your application writes string values directly to the event log, you do not need to set these properties. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不带资源文件的不同源和使用中的源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志。Then create a different source without resource files and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log. 下表显示的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`source` 参数。The `source` parameter.| ||`logName` 参数。The `logName` parameter.| ||在本地计算机 ("。")。The local computer (".").| ||零Zero| ||`null`（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。`null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||`null`（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。`null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||`null`（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。`null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否在事件源名为`SampleApplicationSource`在本地计算机上注册。The following code example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件源不存在，该示例设置源的消息资源文件，并创建新的事件源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最后，代码示例设置使用中的资源标识符值的事件日志的本地化的显示名称`DisplayNameMsgId`中的资源文件路径和`messageFile`。Finally, the code example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

summary.span: 获取或设置类别资源文件中类别的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of categories in the category resource file.

value.span: 类别资源文件中的类别的数目。

span.span: The number of categories in the category resource file.
The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用和属性在写入事件时已本地化的类别字符串。Use the and properties to write events with localized category strings. 如果在写入事件时提供一个类别，事件查看器显示事件项的类别。The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry if you supply a category when you write the event. 事件日志类别是应用程序定义的字符串，用于帮助筛选事件或事件提供进一步的信息。Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide further information on the event. 例如，你的应用程序可以定义分隔不同类别的不同组件或不同的操作。For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations. 事件类别是可选的;如果你的应用程序不使用类别，则不要设置和属性。Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the and properties. 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否在事件源名为`SampleApplicationSource`在本地计算机上注册。The following code example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件源不存在，该示例设置源的消息资源文件，并创建新的事件源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最后，代码示例设置使用中的资源标识符值的事件日志的本地化的显示名称`DisplayNameMsgId`中的资源文件路径和`messageFile`。Finally, the code example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

summary.span: 获取或设置包含源的类别字符串的资源文件的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains category strings for the source.
The path of the category resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用和属性在写入事件时已本地化的类别字符串。Use the and properties to write events with localized category strings. 如果在写入事件时提供一个类别，事件查看器显示事件项的类别。The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry if you supply a category when you write the event. 事件日志类别是应用程序定义的字符串，用于帮助筛选事件或事件提供进一步的信息。Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide further information on the event. 例如，你的应用程序可以定义分隔不同类别的不同组件或不同的操作。For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations. 事件类别是可选的;如果你的应用程序不使用类别，则不要设置和属性。Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the and properties. 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否在事件源名为`SampleApplicationSource`在本地计算机上注册。The following code example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件源不存在，该示例设置源的消息资源文件，并创建新的事件源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最后，代码示例设置使用中的资源标识符值的事件日志的本地化的显示名称`DisplayNameMsgId`中的资源文件路径和`messageFile`。Finally, the code example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

summary.span: 获取或设置事件日志的名称，事件源要向该日志写入项。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the event log to which the source writes entries.
The name of the event log.

value.span: 这可以是 Application、System 或一个自定义的日志名称。

span.span: This can be Application, System, or a custom log name.
The default value is "Application."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来标识你的应用程序使用新的源将条目写入事件日志。Use the property to identify the event log that your application writes entries to using the new source. 事件日志可以是新的日志或现有的日志。The event log can be a new log or an existing log. 应用程序和服务应写入应用程序日志或自定义日志。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 设备驱动程序应该写入系统日志。Device drivers should write to the System log. 如果未显式设置属性，默认为应用程序日志的事件日志。If you do not explicitly set the property, the event log defaults to the Application log. > [!NOTE] > 安全日志是只读的。The Security log is read-only. 若要针对新来源的现有的日志，设置属性设置为现有的事件日志名称。To target an existing log for the new source, set the property to the existing event log name. 若要创建新的事件日志的源，必须设置属性。To create a new event log for the source, you must set the property. 事件日志名称必须由可打印字符组成，且不得包含字符“\*”、“?”或“\\”。Event log names must consist of printable characters, and cannot include the characters '\*', '?', or '\\'. 事件日志名称的前 8 个字符必须不同于指定的计算机上的事件日志的现有名称的前 8 个字符。The first 8 characters of the event log name must be different from the first 8 characters of existing names of event logs on the specified computer. 操作系统将事件日志存储为文件。The operating system stores event logs as files. 当你使用或方法来创建新的事件日志关联的文件存储在指定计算机上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目录中。When you use or the method to create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer. 通过追加的前 8 个字符设置的文件名称".evt"文件扩展名的属性。The file name is set by appending the first 8 characters of the property with the ".evt" file name extension. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过命令行参数设置的事件源的配置属性。The following code example sets the configuration properties for an event source from command-line arguments. 输入的参数指定事件源名称、 事件日志名称、 计算机名和事件消息资源文件。The input arguments specify the event source name, event log name, computer name, and event message resource file. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/VB/source.vb#2)]

member this.MachineName : string with get, set

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置在其上注册事件源的计算机的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the computer on which to register the event source.

value.span: 在其上注册事件源的系统的名称。

span.span: The name of the system on which to register the event source.
The default is the local computer (".").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值不能为空字符串。The value cannot be an empty string. 如果未显式设置的计算机名称，则默认为本地计算机 ("。")。If the machine name is not explicitly set, it defaults to the local computer ("."). 注册时在远程计算机上的源，您必须将使用具有足够权限的注册表值写入该计算机上具有管理权限。When registering a source on a remote computer, you must have administrative rights on that computer to write the registry values with sufficient permissions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过命令行参数设置的事件源的配置属性。The following code example sets the configuration properties for an event source from command-line arguments. 输入的参数指定事件源名称、 事件日志名称、 计算机名和事件消息资源文件。The input arguments specify the event source name, event log name, computer name, and event message resource file. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: The computer name is invalid.

member this.MessageResourceFile : string with get, set

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置消息资源文件的路径，该文件包含源的消息格式字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the message resource file that contains message formatting strings for the source.
The path of the message resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可配置事件日志源写入本地化的事件消息。Use the property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages. 事件消息是应用程序定义的字符串，描述向用户事件。Event messages are application-defined strings that describe the event to the user. 你的应用程序可以编写使用资源标识符的事件日志条目。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers. 资源标识符的消息中编制索引。A resource identifier indexes a message located in the . 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来查找并显示基于当前语言设置的本地化的消息资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized message resource file based on current language settings. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置的事件源。The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法写入本地化的项配置与消息资源文件的源。Use the method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file. 如果你的应用程序写入事件消息字符串直接，而不是在已本地化的资源文件中，使用资源标识符未设置属性。If your application writes event message strings directly, rather than using a resource identifier in a localized resource file, do not set the property. 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否在事件源名为`SampleApplicationSource`在本地计算机上注册。The following code example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件源不存在，该示例设置源的消息资源文件，并创建新的事件源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最后，代码示例设置使用中的资源标识符值的事件日志的本地化的显示名称`DisplayNameMsgId`中的资源文件路径和`messageFile`。Finally, the code example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

permission.span: 用于调用的任何成员以完全信任。

summary.span: 获取或设置资源文件的路径，该文件包含源的消息参数字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message parameter strings for the source.
The path of the parameter resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可配置事件日志源写入本地化的事件消息与插入参数字符串。Use the property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages with inserted parameter strings. 每个本地化的事件消息中指定属性可以包含插入字符串的占位符。Each localized event message specified in the property can contain placeholders for insertion strings. 这些占位符用于指定的位置和资源标识符内的事件消息的独立于语言的字符串。These placeholders are used to specify the position and resource identifier for a language-independent string within the event message. 在使用中的相应字符串的占位符中填充事件查看器和格式化本地化的事件项的事件日志消息。The Event Viewer fills in the placeholders using the corresponding strings from the and formats the event log message for the localized event entry. 例如，消息文本文件中的以下部分定义的参数占位符的字符串：For example, the following section of a message text file defines a string with a parameter placeholder: ``` MessageId = 1501 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_STARTING Language=English Component %%6050 is starting. . ``` 在参数资源文件中，插入字符串必须使用定义的资源标识符对应于该占位符，如下所示：Within the parameter resource file, the insertion string must be defined with the resource identifier that corresponds to the placeholder, as shown below: ``` MessageId = 6050 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_NAME_MSGID Language=English TRIGGER.EXE . ``` 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置的事件源。The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法写入本地化的项配置与消息资源文件的源。Use the method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file. 如果你的应用程序事件消息字符串将直接写入到事件日志，或者如果你属性不包含参数插入占位符的消息，未设置属性。If your application writes event message strings directly to the event log, or if your property does not contain messages with parameter insertion placeholders, do not set the property. 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否在事件源名为`SampleApplicationSource`在本地计算机上注册。The following code example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件源不存在，该示例设置源的消息资源文件，并创建新的事件源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最后，代码示例设置使用中的资源标识符值的事件日志的本地化的显示名称`DisplayNameMsgId`中的资源文件路径和`messageFile`。Finally, the code example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. 具体而言，定义为资源标识符 1004年的消息使用的资源标识符 5002 定义的参数字符串占位符。Specifically, the message defined for resource identifier 1004 uses a placeholder for a parameter string defined for resource identifier 5002. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Source { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Source : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置要在事件日志中注册为事件源的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name to register with the event log as an event source.

value.span: 要在事件日志中注册为项源的名称。

span.span: The name to register with the event log as a source of entries.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 源名称通常是应用程序的名称或大型应用程序内的一个组件的名称。The source name is often the name of the application, or the name of a component within a large application. 方法使用， ，和属性，以在新的源和其关联的事件日志的目标计算机上创建注册表值。The method uses the , , and properties to create registry values on the target computer for the new source and its associated event log. 新的源名称不能与现有的源名称或目标计算机上的现有事件日志名称匹配。A new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name on the target computer. 创建源的注册表值后，你的应用程序可以使用源将条目写入配置的事件日志。After the registry values for the source are created, your application can use the source to write entries to the configured event log. 每个源只能写入到一个事件日志一次;但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。Each source can only write to one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，你的应用程序可能需要多个源配置为使用不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过命令行参数设置的事件源的配置属性。The following code example sets the configuration properties for an event source from command-line arguments. 输入的参数指定事件源名称、 事件日志名称、 计算机名和事件消息资源文件。The input arguments specify the event source name, event log name, computer name, and event message resource file. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_EventSourceCreation_Properties/VB/source.vb#2)]

permission.span: 用于调用的任何成员以完全信任。

span.span: for calling any member of with full trust.
Associated enumeration:
